Title: Verify navigation through sidebar menu options
Description:
Ensure that users can navigate to different sections (Home, Build, Execute, Approve, Manage, Analytics) using the left sidebar menu.
This test case covers the visibility and functionality of the sidebar navigation.
Preconditions: User is logged into the workflow builder application.
Test Steps:
1. Observe the left sidebar menu.
2. Click each menu option (Home, Build, Execute, Approve, Manage, Analytics) one by one.
Expected Result: The main canvas updates to display the corresponding section for each menu option selected.

Title: Verify agent search functionality in Agent Library
Description:
Ensure that users can search for agents in the Agent Library using the search bar.
This test case covers the filtering of agents based on search input.
Preconditions: User is on the workflow builder page with the Agent Library visible.
Test Steps:
1. Locate the search bar in the Agent Library.
2. Enter a keyword (e.g., 'image', 'test', 'qa').
3. Observe the list of agents displayed.
Expected Result: The Agent Library displays only agents matching the search keyword.

Title: Verify adding an agent to the workflow canvas
Description:
Ensure that users can add an agent from the Agent Library to the workflow canvas.
This test case covers the drag-and-drop or click-to-add functionality.
Preconditions: User is on the workflow builder page with the Agent Library and canvas visible.
Test Steps:
1. Select an agent from the Agent Library.
2. Drag and drop the agent onto the workflow canvas (or click to add, if supported).
Expected Result: The selected agent appears as a node on the workflow canvas.

Title: Verify connecting agents on the workflow canvas
Description:
Ensure that users can connect two agent nodes on the workflow canvas to define a workflow sequence.
This test case covers the creation of connections between agents.
Preconditions: At least two agent nodes are present on the workflow canvas.
Test Steps:
1. Click on the output connector of the first agent node.
2. Drag the connector to the input of the second agent node.
3. Release to create the connection.
Expected Result: A connection (dashed line) is established between the two agent nodes, indicating workflow sequence.

Title: Verify enabling and disabling 'Manager LLM' toggle
Description:
Ensure that users can enable or disable the 'Manager LLM' toggle in the workflow controls.
This test case covers the toggle's state change and its effect on the workflow.
Preconditions: User is on the workflow builder page with workflow controls visible.
Test Steps:
1. Locate the 'Enable Manager LLM' toggle in the workflow controls.
2. Click the toggle to enable it.
3. Click the toggle again to disable it.
Expected Result: The toggle switches between enabled and disabled states, reflecting the user's selection.

Title: Verify 'Run' button activation and workflow execution
Description:
Ensure that the 'Run' button becomes active when a valid workflow is configured and initiates workflow execution when clicked.
This test case covers the activation and execution of workflows.
Preconditions: A valid workflow with connected agent nodes is present on the canvas.
Test Steps:
1. Observe the state of the 'Run' button.
2. If inactive, configure a valid workflow by connecting agent nodes.
3. Click the 'Run' button.
Expected Result: The 'Run' button becomes active when the workflow is valid and initiates workflow execution upon clicking.

Title: Verify zoom in and zoom out functionality on workflow canvas
Description:
Ensure that users can zoom in and out of the workflow canvas using the zoom controls.
This test case covers the visibility and usability of the zoom feature.
Preconditions: User is on the workflow builder page with the workflow canvas visible.
Test Steps:
1. Locate the zoom in (+) and zoom out (-) buttons on the canvas.
2. Click the zoom in button and observe the canvas.
3. Click the zoom out button and observe the canvas.
Expected Result: The workflow canvas zooms in and out appropriately, adjusting the view of agent nodes and connections.
